content.rendered:
[vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »full_width » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » el_class= »slider-homepage » z_index= » »][vc_column offset= »vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs »]

Together, let's break the cycle of poverty and give every child a chance

OUR ACTIONS DONATE [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » z_index= » » css= ».vc_custom_1518627175724{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;} » el_class= »delay-load »][vc_column][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » » css= ».vc_custom_1514460597197{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;} »][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Break Poverty : A humanitarian organisation that places innovation at the heart of its action

The mission of this humanitarian organisation, Break Poverty Foundation, is to identify and support innovative solutions against poverty. Its unifying ambition also makes it possible to gather around current issues such as global inequalities or child poverty.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

In order for Break Poverty Foundation to successfully and durably carry out its commitment to the fight against poverty, the following three central pillars have been defined:

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

  • strategic support for transformative programs
  • research
  • mobilisation for innovative solutions

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Discover the different programs that have been selected and are supported by Break Poverty Foundation to fight against poverty in France and abroad.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »yes » type= »full_width » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » z_index= » » el_class= »flex_wrapper delay-load »][vc_column parallax= »content-moving » parallax_image= »16351″ parallax_speed_bg= »1.7″ width= »1/2″ el_class= »split_col » offset= »vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-12 vc_hidden-md vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs »][vc_separator type= »transparent » up= »280″][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/2″ css= ».vc_custom_1512505636256{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #00a0e3 !important;} » el_class= »split_col »][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » » css= ».vc_custom_1513760054788{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;} » el_id= »homepage-form »][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text el_class= »white_text » css= ».vc_custom_1524562629825{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;} »]

Be the first to know about our actions

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1524562657484{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;} »]Stay connected to Break Poverty.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1541007331639{padding-bottom: 30px !important;} »]

Fill in your email adress and we will send you our updates.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1541007310656{padding-bottom: 30px !important;} »]In the pursuit of our transparent and informative approach, we will send you the different updates regarding the financed projets and the progression of the aid programs led by the humanitarian foundation, Break Poverty.[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html css= ».vc_custom_1541761889587{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;} » el_id= »mailchimp_form »][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » z_index= » » css= ».vc_custom_1524221613566{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 100px !important;} » el_class= »homepage_posts_wrapper »][vc_column][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1514457673138{margin-bottom: 70px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;} »]

TOGETHER, WE CAN FIGHT AGAINST EXTREME POVERTY

[/vc_column_text]

THE ECONOMIC CONSEQUENCES OF THE HEALTH CRISIS IN FRANCE

The economic consequences of the health crisis on the French population are dramatic, with an estimated one million people having fallen below the poverty line in 2020.

AN INTOLERABLE INCREASE IN EARLY CHILDHOOD POVERTY AS A RESULT OF THE HEALTH CRISIS

Break Poverty’s study on early childhood poverty and food aid, which surveyed around 100 parents with children aged 0-3 receiving food support, paints an alarming picture of poverty among young children in France, its impact on family stress and its exponential rise due to the Covid-19 crisis.

DIGITAL ILLITERACY, A PHENOMENON THAT AFFECTS THE MOST VULNERABLE

Digital skills are essential for citizens to be fully integrated in today’s society. Most administrative formalities are carried out online, whether it’s completing a tax return, looking for work or creating a business. But what about those on the other side of the digital divide?
  • 1
  • 2
[vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »grid » text_align= »center » css_animation= » » css= ».vc_custom_1514457650280{margin-top: 80px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;} »][vc_column_inner]Discover our articles[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »grid » text_align= »center » css_animation= » » css= ».vc_custom_1513286768371{padding-bottom: 20px !important;} »][vc_column_inner]DONATE NOW[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type= »parallax » parallax_content_width= »in_grid » text_align= »left » full_screen_section_height= »no » background_image= »16586″ parallax_speed= »0.6″ css= ».vc_custom_1537185529326{background-color: #00a0e3 !important;} » el_id= »blue_parallaxe »][vc_column width= »1/3″ css= ».vc_custom_1512594656504{margin-top: 70px !important;margin-bottom: 70px !important;} »][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » » el_class= »icon-box »][vc_column_inner][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1537185567501{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]

2,8 billion

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

people live with less than 1.70€ per day

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/3″ css= ».vc_custom_1512594660754{margin-top: 70px !important;margin-bottom: 70px !important;} »][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » » el_class= »icon-box »][vc_column_inner][vc_raw_html css= ».vc_custom_1519378208179{margin-top: 30px !important;} »][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1537185549212{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]

1 in 5 children

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

in France, is poor

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/3″ css= ».vc_custom_1512594665858{margin-top: 70px !important;margin-bottom: 70px !important;} »][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » » el_class= »icon-box »][vc_column_inner][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1537185558990{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]

100 000 teenagers

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

drop out of school each year in France

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »yes » type= »full_width » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » css= ».vc_custom_1513286658869{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;} » z_index= » »][vc_column][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1536131200898{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;} »]

Several ways to support us

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »grid » text_align= »left » css_animation= » »][vc_column_inner width= »1/4″ css= ».vc_custom_1513286631645{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;} »][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1524563170734{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;} »]Because ending poverty is a challenge we must fight together, we will double the amount of your donation to Break Poverty Foundation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/4″ css= ».vc_custom_1513286635965{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;} »][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1524813418259{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;} »]Sponsorship at Break Poverty Foundation, through the support of our programs, is a way of directly contributing to the fight against extreme poverty. Financial donations, salary round-up, skill-based sponsorship…[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/4″ css= ».vc_custom_1513286640165{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;} »][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1524563224478{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;} »]The bequest allows you to donate all or a portion of your assets to the people of your choice and/or to a foundation like ours, beyond your lifetime or the one of your surviving spouse. In this manner, you retain your assets for the entirety of your life.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/4″ css= ».vc_custom_1513286643899{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;} »][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1536130976336{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;} »]This donation allows you to transfer, while alive and in an irrevocable manner, an asset of your choosing. Your gift can be of a real estate nature (one or more properties), of a financial amount, an investment portfolio or even an art piece.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » css= ».vc_custom_1512593321267{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 70px !important;} » z_index= » »][vc_column][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1541007553151{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;} »]

Stay in touch

Follow our updates on social media to remain informed about the evolution of our different commitments against the poverty of children and of their families across the world.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »grid » text_align= »left » css_animation= » »][vc_column_inner][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
